translation: Tohyih vuchhvunh suh shkhṣ yus ạkhrt kis jzahs th szahs ankar chuh kran?
Yih chuh sue yus ytyms dhkh chuh layan.
Th mskyn khyavns pytth chuhnh trghyb divan. (nh chuh pnnis nfss aamhi kamhi khạṭr āmadh kran th nh chuh pnnyn bạczan vanan zi mskyns ạsiv khyn divan, th nh chuh lukn mskynn hndi mdd khạṭr rạghb kran)
Pth chhe tbạhy timn nmaz parn valyn khạṭr,
Yim pnnhi nmazi nishhi ghflt chih vrtavan. (aamhi nishhi chuhnh murad nmazi mnz mshith gczuhn blkh chuh murad nmazi nishhi be prvah gczuhn)
Th ẓrvrtkụ̄ mʿmvly chyz chihnh (lukn) divan.
